name: All the Nerdy Ladies
body:
Nerdish? Ladyish? Fancy a social hour (or two) with other nerdy ladies? Then head on down to [Joystick Gamebar](http://joystickgamebar.com/) every first Thursday at 7pm.

You'll find members from [Women Who Code](http://www.meetup.com/Women-Who-Code-Atlanta/), [Rails Girls Atlanta](http://www.meetup.com/Rails-Girls-Atlanta/), and [PyLadiesAtl](http://www.meetup.com/PyLadiesATL/) who range from full time software developers to those simply curious about programming/development/technology in general (and everyone in between).
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
